string.text: Выражаем особую благодарность этим актёрам озвучки
Сергею "GSC" Григоровичу и всем бывшим/действующим сотрудникам GSC Game World, которые помогли в создании игры нашей мечты
Мы также благодарим за участие в разработке
В последнюю - но не по значению! - очередь мы хотим поблагодарить всех игроков за постоянную поддержку в течение всего периода разработки.\nУвидимся в Зоне!
Спасибо всем, кто помог нашей команде закончить Lost Alpha DC, а также дождался её выхода :)
Special thanks from CD Projekt to:
Texas Tactical Outdoor Range, Henley, Texas
Recording and Post Production by Andrew Brock
Creature Vocal Performances by Paul Arnold and Andrew Brock
Foley Artists - Andrew Barnabas and Dave Sullivan
and the rest of Chernobyl Power Plant staff
for allowing us to do our crazy explorations
and the rest of Chernobylinterinform agency staff
for taking good care of us and feeding us
with ample info and nourishing lunches
informational input and his noble mission
and the rest of Merregnon® Studios
some great orchestral music for us
Alexey “Don Reba” Badalov, Emile aka Redrick,
Peter Sjoberg, Pixel, Michi, nasa800, LPKorn3324,
Leks, Cpcat, Rad-X, Sosed, Amoki, Claws,
and Mike Bretschneider, cractus01, Marcel Kleffmann,
Nikolay Dashevsky, Abe, Anton Brovko, Mario, fen1x,
Dima Kudryavcev, Ruben Cos, Soeren Haraldsted,
Lev Sokolov aka Davinci, Max Popenker, Matthias Krahenbuhl,
DEICIDE[NBF], Martin Diermayr, Markus Rothhammer, Stefan Aumann
Stefan Herr (BADBOY) P-90, Blake Sherrill, THOMAS KRAUSE,
Yan Oleshkovskiy aka Mad Dog, Samael aka Arimanov, RVCool,
Lestat, Sergey Pivin, Gall, Critic, Dmitriy “DoN Rumata” Kozlov,
Kondratiev S.A., Dmitriy Kalinin, Max Tarasov, Andrey Rogozin aka Raga,
Michael Alesich, Piedimonte Alessandro, Bad, Marf, Vantala,
Behringer, DA_Star, STALKER Sanek, Dave Miller (P R E Y)
Goodspeed, Ian_C, Grisly Silence, Midnight Rambler, Dale Oleverio,
ruintertained, UltimateGecko, Snowgim, Franz La Zerte, Chickenballz,
Alan Nogueira da Gama and so many more of you
around the globe who passionately supported
From the entire team THANKS to all of you who
ever helped us make S.T.A.L.K.E.R. happen
and encouraged us no matter what!
Your good efforts will not be forgotten!
We would like to say our big thanks to open-source projects:
ode.org for physics engine (Open Dynamic Engine, ODE)
xiph.org for video (Theora) and audio (Vorbis) codecs
intelle-soft.com for free bug catching library BugTrap
Also thanks to the companies who helped with game's optimization:
